Bloomington.Tenth Street Stadium: Tenth Street Stadium was a stadium in Bloomington, Indiana, USA. Originally named Memorial Stadium, it was primarily used for college football, and was the home field of the Indiana University football team between 1925 and 1959, prior to the opening of the new Memorial Stadium. The stadium held 20,000 people and was built in 1925. It replaced Jordan Field which had been the home field for the program since 1887.
